metadata.title: CVE-2017-9433 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Document Liberation Project libmwaw before 2017-04-08 has an out-of-boundswrite caused by a heap-based buffer overflow related to theMsWrd1Parser::readFootnoteCorrespondance function in lib/MsWrd1Parser.cxx.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmwaw-0.3-3 - 0.3.7-1ubuntu2.1
libmwaw-tools - 0.3.7-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmwaw package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.7-1ubuntu2.1').
